articles.title: Coronafonds 2.0 – Wie Macron und Draghi Brüssels Schuldenherrschaft verstetigen

EU leaders are scrambling to find ways to urgently address the fallout of Russia's invasion of Ukraine that has imperilled the bloc's economy and exposed a dire need for a stronger defence. Photo by Eliot Blondet / ABACAPRESS.COM
